mapper.select: select c.`corp_name` as corp_name, cu.`name` as name, cu.`phone` as phone, cu.`email` as email, c.`create_time` as register_time from `client` c left join `client_user` cu on c.`primary_user_id` = cu.`id` where (c.`corp_name` like '%${name}%' or c.`short_name` like '%${name}%') and c.`id` != #{clientId} limit 5
